query:
SELECT 
                id,
                attributes,
                occurred_at
            FROM monitoring_events_timeline
            WHERE event_class = 'APIRequestEvent'
              AND (attributes->>'response_time_ms')::INTEGER > 1000
              AND occurred_at > NOW() - ($1 || ' hours')::INTERVAL
            ORDER BY (attributes->>'response_time_ms')::INTEGER DESC
            LIMIT 10
